# textField

**Instance Property**

The text field that the scrubber item uses to display its text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var textField: NSTextField { get }
```

## Discussion

Access and configure the underlying text field used to display the text in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberTextItemView/title] property.

## Providing text content

- **title**: The text displayed for the scrubber item.
